ValueSet-IMMZD5DTPneumococcalContraindic.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD5DTPneumococcalContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD5DTPneumococcalContraindicationsVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
